snippet.title: Hardspace: Shipbreaker - Xbox Series X|S Release Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description: Hardspace: Shipbreaker, the acclaimed zero-g spaceship-salvaging sandbox from Blackbird Interactive and Focus Entertainment, just announced its console release date in a thrilling new trailer! Announced at the same time as the game’s reveal over two years ago, the console port will finally arrive on September 20, coming to Xbox Series X|S. The game will also be available Day One with Xbox Game Pass. Prepare for next-gen console-powered shifts in space with Hardspace: Shipbreaker’s Console Release Date Announcement Trailer, premiered during the Gamescom Opening Night Live!
